iebaker.neon.world

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • iebaker.neon.world.Vertex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cell

    public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Vertex is a class which represents a single Vertex in the Graph. A vertex is aware of its decorations, and of the edges of which it is a part.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(java.lang.String id,
      Decoration d)
        Constructor. Creates a new Vertex with decorations specified by d
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the newly created Vertex.
        d - The decorations to add to the newly created Vertex

    • Method Detail

      • decorate

        public void decorate(Decoration d)
        Adds a decoration to this Vertex specified by a Decoration object. Keys which are already mapped to values will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        d - The decoration object which holds decorations for this vertex

      • decorate

        public void decorate(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.String value)
        Adds a single decoration to this Vertex specified by a string which will be the key, and a string which whill be the value indexed by that key. A key which is already mapped to a value will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - The string to use as the key
        value - The String to use as the value

      • strip

        public java.lang.String strip(java.lang.String key)
        Removes the decoration indexed by a specific string, and returns the element which was previously indexed there.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove from the decorations
        Returns:
        The value which was stored at that key

      • decoration

        public java.lang.String decoration(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the decoration associated with a specific string
        Parameters:
        key - The key which is associated with the desired decoration
        Returns:
        The value associated with the desired key

      • getInEdges

        public java.util.List<Edge> getInEdges()
        Returns a list of the incoming edges to this vertex
        Returns:
        A list of all vertexs whose head is this vertex

      • getOutEdges

        public java.util.List<Edge> getOutEdges()
        Returns a list of all outgoing edges from this vertex
        Returns:
        a List of all vertexs whose tail is this vertex
